REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f0653 reute d f BC-NEW-BEDFORD-SAVINGS-G 03-12 0045

TEXT.TITLE: NEW BEDFORD SAVINGS GOES PUBLIC
TEXT.BODY: <New Bedford Institution for Savings> said it completed its conversion to a stock form of ownership from a mutual savings bank. In the conversion, it said it issued 9.4 mln shares at 14.375 dlrs each. Reuter
